ingredients.ingredient: 1 bunch kale, ribs removed and leaves torn into pieces
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Thoroughly dry the kale after washing to ensure crispy chips rather than chewy ones
Toss gently with oil and seasoning to evenly coat without bruising the delicate leaves
Bake at 300Â°F until edges begin to curl and chips are crispy, about 15-20 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on how moisture is the enemy of crispness and how to select, prepare, and monitor kale chips for optimal texture.
